com.jumio.nv.custom

Interface NetverifyCustomScanPresenter


  • public interface NetverifyCustomScanPresenter
    Presenter class to control the Netverify custom scanning view

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void confirmScan()
      Confirm the scanned picture
      void destroy()
      Releases all allocated resources (Camera, ...).
      void getHelpAnimation(NetverifyCustomAnimationView customAnimationView)
      Get the help animation for the currently active scan mode.
      java.lang.String getHelpText()
      Get the help text for the currently active scan mode.
      NetverifyScanMode getScanMode()
      Get the currently active scan mode.
      boolean hasFlash() 
      boolean hasHelpAnimation()
      Check if there is an help animation available for this scan part
      boolean hasMultipleCameras() 
      boolean isCameraFrontFacing() 
      boolean isFallbackAvailable() 
      boolean isFlashOn() 
      void pause()
      This function needs to be called in the onPause lifecycle function of the Fragment or Activity
      void pauseExtraction()
      Pause the extraction but keep the camera preview running
      void recreate(NetverifyCustomScanView scanView, NetverifyCustomConfirmationView confirmationView, NetverifyCustomScanInterface netverifyCustomScanInterface)
      This should only be called in case the hosting activity gets recreated
      void resume()
      This function needs to be called in the onResume lifecycle function of the Fragment or Activity
      void resumeExtraction()
      Resume the extraction
      void retryScan()
      Restart scan if the scan has been stopped
      boolean showShutterButton() 
      void startFallback()
      Switches to the fallback scan mode (overlay and probably scan side will be changed)
      void startScan()
      Starts a scan after a scan presenter has been initialized
      void stopScan()
      Scan can be stopped manually, retryScan is possible after this method is called.
      void switchCamera()
      switches between the cameras
      void takePicture()
      Manually takes a picture - only possible if showShutterButton() returns true
      void toggleFlash()
      Toggles the flash, if one is available

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Releases all allocated resources (Camera, ...). Must be called when scanning is finished. retryScan is not possible anymore

      • recreate

        void recreate(NetverifyCustomScanView scanView,
              NetverifyCustomConfirmationView confirmationView,
              NetverifyCustomScanInterface netverifyCustomScanInterface)
        This should only be called in case the hosting activity gets recreated
        Parameters:
        scanView - new reference for NetverifyCustomScanView
        confirmationView - new reference for NetverifyCustomConfirmationView
        netverifyCustomScanInterface - new callback NetverifyCustomScanInterface

      • getScanMode

        NetverifyScanMode getScanMode()
        Get the currently active scan mode. If a fallback is triggered, this function should be called again to check for a changed scan mode.
        Returns:
        NetverifyScanMode

      • getHelpText

        java.lang.String getHelpText()
        Get the help text for the currently active scan mode. If a fallback or NetverifyCustomScanInterface.onNetverifyScanForPartCanceled(ScanSide, NetverifyCancelReason) is triggered, this function should be called again to check for a changed help text.
        Returns:
        the help text or null

      • getHelpAnimation

        void getHelpAnimation(NetverifyCustomAnimationView customAnimationView)
        Get the help animation for the currently active scan mode. If a fallback or NetverifyCustomScanInterface.onNetverifyScanForPartCanceled(ScanSide, NetverifyCancelReason) is triggered, this function should be called again to check for a changed help animation.

      • hasHelpAnimation

        boolean hasHelpAnimation()
        Check if there is an help animation available for this scan part
        Returns:
        true if an help animation is available

      • resume

        void resume()
        This function needs to be called in the onResume lifecycle function of the Fragment or Activity

      • pause

        void pause()
        This function needs to be called in the onPause lifecycle function of the Fragment or Activity

      • startScan

        void startScan()
        Starts a scan after a scan presenter has been initialized

      • retryScan

        void retryScan()
        Restart scan if the scan has been stopped

      • confirmScan

        void confirmScan()
        Confirm the scanned picture

      • stopScan

        void stopScan()
        Scan can be stopped manually, retryScan is possible after this method is called.

      • hasFlash

        boolean hasFlash()
        Returns:
        true if flash is available

      • isFlashOn

        boolean isFlashOn()
        Returns:
        true if flash is currently on

      • toggleFlash

        void toggleFlash()
        Toggles the flash, if one is available

      • hasMultipleCameras

        boolean hasMultipleCameras()
        Returns:
        true if multiple cameras are available

      • isCameraFrontFacing

        boolean isCameraFrontFacing()
        Returns:
        true if the camera in use is front facing

      • switchCamera

        void switchCamera()
        switches between the cameras

      • isFallbackAvailable

        boolean isFallbackAvailable()
        Returns:
        true if fallback scan mode is available

      • startFallback

        void startFallback()
        Switches to the fallback scan mode (overlay and probably scan side will be changed)

      • showShutterButton

        boolean showShutterButton()
        Returns:
        true if a shutterbutton need to be shown

      • takePicture

        void takePicture()
        Manually takes a picture - only possible if showShutterButton() returns true

      • pauseExtraction

        void pauseExtraction()
        Pause the extraction but keep the camera preview running

      • resumeExtraction

        void resumeExtraction()
        Resume the extraction
